class.name: GDExtension
class.description: The [GDExtension] resource type represents a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shared_library]shared library[/url] which can expand the functionality of the engine. The [GDExtensionManager] singleton is responsible for loading, reloading, and unloading [GDExtension] resources. [b]Note:[/b] GDExtension itself is not a scripting language and has no relation to [GDScript] resources.

method.name: get_minimum_library_initialization_level
method.description: Returns the lowest level required for this extension to be properly initialized (see the [enum InitializationLevel] enum).

method.name: is_library_open
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this extension's library has been opened.

constants.constant: The library is initialized at the same time as the core features of the engine.
The library is initialized at the same time as the engine's servers (such as [RenderingServer] or [PhysicsServer3D]).
The library is initialized at the same time as the engine's scene-related classes.
The library is initialized at the same time as the engine's editor classes. Only happens when loading the GDExtension in the editor.
